node.detail_zh: 患者為空手道運動員周家謙，與早前確診的另外兩名運動員李振豪及曾綺婷一同到過法國及奧地利集訓。於 3 月 20 日起出現咳嗽及頭痛症狀，現於威爾斯醫院留醫，屬香港體育學院群組 ( 第 172 及 254 宗個案 )。
node.detail_en: The patient is Chow Ka Him, karate athlete of Hong Kong.   He went to France and Austria for training with Lee Chun Ho and Tsang Yi Ting.  He started having coughing and headache since Mar 20.   He is now in Prince of Wales Hospital. He is part of Hong Kong Sports Institute cluster (cases #172 & #254)
node.group_description_zh: 香港空手道團 3 名運動員及教練曾到法國集訓，回港後先後確診。
node.group_description_en: 3 karate athletes and 1 coach trained in France, and were confirmed positive to coronavirus upon return to Hong Kong.

node.location_zh: 香港體育學院精英運動員宿舍
node.location_en: Athlete's Hostel in HK Sports Institues

node.remarks_zh: 與早前確診的另外兩名運動員李振豪及曾綺婷一同去過法國及奧地利集訓
node.remarks_en: Attend training with two other athletes.

node.remarks_zh: 與早前確診的另外兩名運動員李振豪及曾綺婷一同去過法國及奧地利集訓
node.remarks_en: Attend training with two other athletes.

node.remarks_zh: 3 月 20 日開始咳嗽及頭痛；屬香港體育學院群組 ( 個宗 #172 及 #254 )
node.remarks_en: Developed cough and headache since Mar 20; is part of Hong Kong Sports Institute cluster (cases #172 & #254)
